players.name: Alice
memory: You're Alice, the mafioso.
Night 1 begins.
You killed Diana.
Diana was found dead.
Day 1 begins.
You: "I am shocked Diana was killed! We need to share any info — did anyone see suspicious behavior last night?"
Bob: "I’m sorry to hear about Diana. No one saw anything — I was asleep. Alice, do you have any reason to suspect someone? We should avoid accusing without evidence."
Charlie: "I investigated Alice last night and found they're the mafioso. We should arrest Alice now."
You: "Charlie, accusing someone so quickly feels risky — why would you reveal an investigation result publicly now instead of waiting to be sure? That sounds like a play to frame someone."
Bob: "Charlie, if you actually investigated Alice, why reveal it right away? Detectives usually wait to be sure or to coordinate. Can you share when you investigated and what exactly you saw?"
Charlie: "I investigated Alice last night and my investigation result is that Alice is the mafioso. Diana was killed at night, so we need to act now and vote to arrest Alice."
